Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Class EntryService

java.lang.Object
be.helha.api_recettapp.services.EntryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntryService
@Service public class EntryService extends Object implements IEntryService
Handle CRUD to handle Entry object with the corresponding JPA Repository
